arts.ttl: Lacazette makes up for giving away a penalty with 2 goals as Lyon wins
arts.sum: Alexandre Lacazette made up for giving away an early penalty by scoring twice as Lyon beat Brest 2-1 in the French league on Sunday. The 33-year-old is in his second spell with the club following five seasons with Premier League side Arsenal and is well ahead as the club’s second-highest all-time scorer with 194 goals.
